Welcome to my website

Whenever you want to check...

This website was made for you. From now on whenever you need to check the weather, capital city, news or calendar out, you can always visit this page and check whatever you want. I hope you are going to like my page.

In order to check weather in your city, write name of your city in English in. If you want to know the temperature in your area you have to make similar steps to checking weather. Today's page from calendar will be shown immediately when you click in link.

Weather

This is place where you can check todays's weather out

News

This is place where you can check todays's news out

Map

This is place where you can check capital city out

Calendar

This is place where you can check todays's date out
